title: How can I enter into forced downloading mode?
answer:
When your computer can’t recognize E586DS, that means you can’t see new ports or new network card come out in Device Manager, in this case, you can use forced download to upgrade.  

In the power off mode, press and hold ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/resource/Image/0-111208152734.PNG)and![](http://consumer.huawei.com/resource/Image/1-111208152742.PNG) at least 5 seconds (hold ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/resource/Image/1-111208152756.PNG)first) then you can see “force update” shown on the OLED screen, now release press ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/resource/Image/1-111208152814.PNG)key again, then you find OLED has a icon like download.  

After the icon ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/resource/Image/2-111208152828.PNG)has appeared run one key update again to update firmware
